text: I was never an ambitious girl, or even a self-confident one. I never went in for beauty pageants or wore a stitch of make-up until I went to Los Angeles.
author: Pamela Anderson

text: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

text: There is a role and function for beauty in our time.
author: Tadao Ando

text: I like the beauty of Faulkner's poetry. But I don't like his themes, not at all.
author: Manuel Puig

text: You get more churches burned down in the United States in the last two years than in the last hundred, because of the lack of understanding of culture and diversity and the beauty of it.
author: Edward James Olmos
